name: LightBike Runner
description:
The super-hit series LightBike returns with LightBike Runner!
Scream along a cyber-highway on your customized LightBike!

Features:
- Control your LightBike with swipes and tilting.
- Charge onwards by dodging walls and leaping over chasms!
- Smash through walls with the boost power-up!
- Buy new LightBikes with coins earned in game!
- Upgrade your LightBike and aim for even higher scores!
- More than 20 unique LightBikes at launch, with more coming in updates!
- And, of course, Pankia integration! Compete with other players worldwide for the highest score!

What is "Pankia"?
Pankia is a library for multiplayer iPhone games based on technology extracted from LightBike.
